output.sentences: At night, snowflakes, snow, and rain pummeled the streets.
Drunk Lilian, decided to pose for a selfie in the snow, as a standing snow angel.
Quckly, we hustled home to escape the barrage of snow and misty rain sprinking everything in white.
Along the way, we noticed we were leaving a trail of footprints to our home.
Happily at home, Pickles, our cat came to rub himself against Ron's toes, eager for cuddle time.
